decisions: Establish lightweight automation systems for content creation before full video automation
Build execution accelerators to reduce creative friction
Focus on testing and refining automation layers after 2–3 manual iterations
insights: Creative work can be streamlined through strategic automation that reduces repetitive tasks
Even small automation layers improve mental energy, which compounds into larger efficiency gains
Start with tools that tackle most draining creative tasks first, like titles, thumbnails, and voice estimations
actions_taken: Created Voice & Visual Effort Estimator script
Implemented Daily Progress Logger structure for quick journaling
notes: This log defines the foundational layers to speed up content production. These are lightweight processes aimed at reducing friction and saving time. The pre-automation layers are designed to accelerate execution without overwhelming the creator.
